channel.title: Allowing More then 1 user per IP
channel.description: Okay, im trying to make a hidden account, so therefore people don't beg for stuff from me, but i want to double client, and i cant because something is not letting me... idk what i have to remove, but i want it to let me play on how ever many accounts i want.

ngHost);
